items.content_html: MemorySnap - MemorySnap is a lightweight web app for weddings and events that lets guests participate in fun photo challenges. Capture memories, complete creative tasks, and relive the best moments ‚Äî all in one shared place.

items.content_html: Part 1 of my PP5 project for my full stack software diploma (advanced frontend). This is the front end component to the application utilizing react and typescript to build a scalable lightweight discord clone, for people who want to meet and make friends with others of like minded interests

items.content_html: A lightweight, performance-optimized React bundler for Remix Icon SVGs. Instead of importing the entire Remix Icon package or relying on CDN, this library dynamically loads only the icons you use, dramatically reducing bundle size and improving offline availability.
items.title: inomag/remixicon-react-bundler: A lightweight, performance-optimized React bundler for Remix Icon SVGs. Instead of importing the entire Remix Icon package or relying on CDN, this library dynamically loads only the icons you use, dramatically reducing bundle size and improving offline availability.

items.content_html: User-crud-server is a lightweight API designed for managing user data with simple create, read, update, and delete operations. It offers a straightforward interface for developers to integrate user management into their applications efficiently.

items.content_html: psfree-lapse is a lightweight tool that simplifies the process of creating time-lapse videos from still images. It supports various image formats and allows users to customize frame rates for smooth playback.
